'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Rarities Archive''''' is an album by [[Howard Shore]] comprising of mock-up, alternate, and previously unreleased versions of tracks from the score of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings film series]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=Doug Adams|articleurl=http://www.musicoflotr.com/2010/08/lord-of-rings-rarities-archive.html|articlename=The Lord of the Rings: The Rarities Archive|dated=August 12, 2010|website=The Music of the Lord of the Rings Films|accessed=September 20, 2021}}</ref> It was compiled for and bundled with the book ''[[The Music of the Lord of the Rings Films]]'' by author [[Doug Adams]].
